p: The inhibitory effect on tyrosinase of the two most polar ME and HA extracts, the non-polar DCM and SFE extracts, as well as the EO of S. sipylea was investigated at five different concentrations. Tyrosinase is a key regulatory enzyme that catalyzes melanin synthesis within melanocytes. Therefore, tyrosinase inhibitors have become increasingly important in cosmetics and pharmaceuticals as whitening agents [ 44]. Thus far, however, there have not been reports to confer the evaluation of the tyrosinase inhibitory activity of different polarity extracts from the aerial parts of S. sipylea. Figure 4 shows the results for tyrosinase inhibitory activity.
